name: Funk Dungeon
description:
Post jam version here (minor bug fixes)
https://teamterrible.itch.io/funk-dungeon-postjam

Welcome to the Funk Dungeon

  • Challenge Skellies to dance contests
  • Explore spooky rooms filled with bones, party hats and cool flashy lights!
  • Find your missing party gear before you're lost in the funk 

Controls: Arrows or WSAD to move and attack 
Step back from an enemy before they show you their moves!
